cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on November 2, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4256, Investing in Main Street Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 114 (Wednesday, June 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CHU:
H.R. 4256.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1
``The Congress shall have Power to . . . provide for the .
. . general Welfare of the United States; . . .''
[Page H3580]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

title: Investing in Main Street Act of 2021
